entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:56 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: ENE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Freezing rain over higher terrain this evening. Fog patches. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 20 after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
